item.Q:

item.A:
蜀 (strokes unavailable)
shǔ

páng

俏 (strokes unavailable)
qiào

俯 (strokes unavailable)
fǔ

敞 (strokes unavailable)
chǎng
敞开 (敞開) chǎngkāi (v) open up wide

渣 (strokes unavailable)
zhā
煤渣 méizhā slack

zǔ

shēn
